item.title: 在一些家庭准备出发去春运的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:
As some families get set to take off for spring break, a new video of a woman battling over a window shade on a plane has sparked a new question about comfort and courtesy for travelers. https://t.co/ZhsCGUHyoI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 一辆摩托车撞上了一辆汽车，车内有一对母女，佛罗里达州一名副警长思维敏捷，在撞车后几秒钟内就赶到了现场，被誉为拯救了生命。
item.description:
After a motorcycle crashed into a car with a mother and her two daughters inside, a Florida deputy’s quick thinking — and his arrival to the scene within seconds of the collision — is being heralded for saving lives. https://t.co/xniIYmesTZ pic.twitter.com/Q0fA5oqkwl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在起诉 OpenAI 及其首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman），称其背叛了该 ChatGPT 制造商的创始宗旨--造福人类而非追求利润。
item.description:
Elon Musk is suing OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman over what he says is a betrayal of the ChatGPT maker's founding aims of benefiting humanity rather than pursuing profits. https://t.co/WdpKYqMYDR pic.twitter.com/6IFCIIdjDS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 环保活动人士正在柏林附近的一片森林中举行抗议活动，反对扩建电动汽车制造商特斯拉欧洲首家工厂的计划，并誓言要在原地待命数周。
item.description:
Environmental activists are staging a protest in a forest near Berlin against plans to expand the grounds of electric carmaker Tesla's first plant in Europe and are vowing to stay in place for weeks. https://t.co/QWMSh9SRs6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: "@JamesAALongman 从乌克兰的一家武器工厂发回的报道称："乌克兰人基本上不得不设法秘密制造武器，希望不会遭到俄罗斯人的轰炸。
item.description:
"Essentially the Ukrainians have to try to make weapons in secret, hoping that they don't get bombed by the Russians."@JamesAALongman reports from a weapons factory in Ukraine. https://t.co/SdtJQL2MXP pic.twitter.com/fkORvXAKLV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description:
WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. https://t.co/wMwdNe69Ps

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 电视摄像机首次获准拍摄乌克兰的武器制造过程。你可能认为乌克兰不会制造自己的武器--他们的确会。但在西方斡旋多年达成和平条约和不扩散协议后，他们已经大大落后于 #乌克兰
item.description:
The first time TV cameras have been allowed to see Ukrainian arms manufacturing. You might think Ukraine doesn’t make any of their own weapons - they do. But after years of peace treaties and non proliferation agreements brokered by the west, they’re massively behind #ukraine pic.twitter.com/1DMOweKeKg

— James Longman (@JamesAALongman) March 1, 2024

item.title: "如果不是我的家人和朋友有能力把钱存进我的银行账户，我早就流落街头了。"最近的一项研究发现，半数美国人的住房成本负担沉重，这正式反映了全国租房者面临的严峻现实。
item.description:
"Had I not had family and friends that could afford to just put money in my bank account, I'd be on the streets.”

Half of Americans are burdened by the cost of housing, a recent study found, officially capturing the grim reality facing renters nationwide. https://t.co/Z34j7c2bCn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 两届世界大赛冠军蒂姆-韦克菲尔德（Tim Wakefield）的遗孀斯泰西-韦克菲尔德（Stacy Wakefield）已经去世。她的家人在通过红袜队发表的一份声明中说，她于周三在马萨诸塞州的家中去世，这距离她丈夫去世还不到五个月。
item.description:
Stacy Wakefield, the widow of two-time World Series champion Tim Wakefield, has died.

Her family said in a statement released through the Red Sox that she died Wednesday at her Massachusetts home, less than five months after her husband died. https://t.co/n7fHy52JRO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024
